guides/android.title: Android Guide
guides/android.description: Two XML resource files are generated: colors.xml and dimens.xml.

guides/css.title: CSS Guide
guides/css.description: After running npm run build:tokens, import the generated CSS file and use tokens as CSS custom properties.

guides/figma-export.title: Figma Export Guide
guides/figma-export.description: This guide covers how to export design tokens from Figma into the W3C DTCG JSON format used by this system.

guides/ios.title: iOS Guide
guides/ios.description: Two Swift files are generated: StyleDictionaryColor.swift and StyleDictionarySize.swift.

guides/scss.title: SCSS Guide
guides/scss.description: Two SCSS files are generated: variables.scss (individual $variables) and map.scss (a nested $tokens map).

guides/typescript.title: TypeScript Guide
guides/typescript.description: The TypeScript module (dist/ts/tokens.ts) provides two ways to access tokens: tree-shakable named exports and a nested object.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: A production-ready design token pipeline that transforms Figma exports into platform-specific code.

tokens/border-radius.title: Border Radius
tokens/border-radius.description: Border radius tokens range from sharp corners (none) to full pill shapes (full). Source: tokens/primitives/border-radius.json.

tokens/colors.title: Colors
tokens/colors.description: The color palette consists of 6 hues (blue, gray, green, red, yellow, purple), each with 10 shades from 50 (lightest) to 900 (darkest).

tokens/opacity.title: Opacity
tokens/opacity.description: Opacity tokens provide a consistent scale from fully transparent (0) to fully opaque (100). Source: tokens/primitives/opacity.json.

tokens/semantic-colors.title: Semantic Colors
tokens/semantic-colors.description: Semantic tokens give purpose-driven names to primitive values. Instead of using color.blue.600 directly, your components reference semantic.color.action.primary â€” making it trivial to retheme the entire product by updating one token.

tokens/shadows.title: Shadows
tokens/shadows.description: Shadow tokens define elevation levels for UI components. Source: tokens/primitives/shadow.json.

tokens/spacing.title: Spacing
tokens/spacing.description: The spacing scale is based on a 4px grid. Each step multiplies the base unit, providing consistent, harmonious layout spacing. Source: tokens/primitives/spacing.json.

tokens/typography.title: Typography
tokens/typography.description: Typography tokens define font sizes, weights, line heights, and letter spacing. Source: tokens/primitives/typography.json.
